title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-3.5 - Outgoing privileged mail
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-3.5 - Outgoing privileged mail

State Regulations

Outgoing privileged mail will be handled in accord with the
provisions of Subpart 171-2 of this Part, except as follows: (a) Outgoing privileged mail may be sealed by
the resident. (b) The provisions
for reading and/or confiscating outgoing resident privileged mail will be the
same as outlined in section
171-3.4
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
171-3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
